text: Esir tuttukları küçük kardeşimi öldürmekle tehdit ettiler.
english: my younger brother, whom they were holding captive . This

text: Kardeşimi onun elinden kurtarın ne olur.
english: save my brother from him. We
will serve you as slaves until we die.
(Ares) I won't let anyone harm you, Marya.

text: ...o zaman ben de seni bu tuzaktan kurtaracağım.
english: ...then I will rescue you from this trap.

text: Söyle bana, o Antheus denen adam nerede?
english: Tell me, where is this man named Antheus?
Antheus sent his men, Lord Simko.
What about the letter? Has it
Ares has now fallen into my arms.
He will give me my gold coins one by one.
me, I don't mind my own slavery.
I only feel sorry for you. Don't worry, Pito,

text: Ne kendin için, ne de benim için üzülmeyesin Pito.
english: neither for yourself nor for me . In

text: Bitmemiş ömrün her anında bir umut kapısı vardır.
english: every moment of an unfinished life, there is a door of hope. The important thing is that

text: İş ki biz o kapıyı açmak için mücadele edelim.
english: we fight to open that door .

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im, ömrümde senin kadar sağlam yürekli...
english: Ertuğrul Bey, it wouldn't be a lie to say

text: ...bir adam daha görmedim desem yalan olmaz.
english: I've never seen a man as strong-hearted as you in my life .

text: Fakat umudun da sonuna geldik artık.
english: But we've reached the end of all hope now.
Despair is forbidden to us, Pito.

text: Allah'ın rahmetinden ümit kesmeyin diye emredilmiştir bize.
english: We are commanded not to despair of God's mercy. I have

text: Şayet son nefesimi tüketmeden koy verirsem...
english: If I were to give up before taking my last breath ...

text: ...o vakit o nefes bana haram olur.
english: ...then that breath would be forbidden to me.
Tell the slaves to stand ready.
We will fight to the death one last time.

text: (Ares dış ses) Haşmetli ve yüce imparator.
(Ares dış ses) Sınırlarımızdaki Türk obaları perişan haldeler.
english: (Ares's voiceover) The Turkish settlements on our borders are in a desperate situation.

text: (Ares dış ses) Selçuklu Emiri Sadeddin, menfaatleri için her şeyi yapabilecek biri.
english: (Ares's voiceover) Seljuk Emir Sadeddin is someone who will do anything for his own interests.

text: (Ares dış ses) Onunla şimdilik Hanlı Pazar'ı ortak işleteceğim.
english: (Ares's voiceover) For now, I'll be running Hanlı Bazaar with him as a partner.

text: (Ares dış ses) Fakat pazar yakında tamamen bizim olacak.
english: (Ares's voiceover) But the market will soon be entirely ours.
(Ares's voiceover) In the name of our sacred cause...

text: ...Türkleri yok etmenin ve bizden aldıkları her şeyi geri almanın tam vaktidir.
english: ...it is high time to annihilate the Turks and reclaim everything they took from us.

text: (Ares dış ses) Bizi bekleyen şanlı zafer için...
english: (Ares's voiceover) For the glorious victory that awaits us...
...I beg you to grant me a great army...

text: ...ve pazarda bizim için iş yürütecek yetkin birini göndermenizi diliyorum.
english: ...and to send me a competent man to conduct business for us in the market .

text: (Ares dış ses) Sadık hizmetkârınız Tekfur Ares.
english: (Ares's voiceover) Your loyal servant, Tekfur Ares.
Wow, amazing! Praise be to Him
who unites mountains with mountains... who
brings lovers together with their beloved.
Welcome everyone! (Sound of a horse neighing)
Come on, give me a hug!
Oh my god, I'd sacrifice myself for you! Son, son!
Welcome Turgut. -It's good to see you, mother.

text: Hoş geldin oğlum, hoş geldin, hoş geldin.

english: How are you, my brave one? My brave lion!

text: Sağ salim döndünüz, şükürler olsun Allah'ıma.
english: You've returned safe and sound, thank God.
For our Sultan, for our state...
We returned to our village with our heads held high, mother.
You turned our darkness into light.
You have brought joy to our homeland.
May God bless my brother. You turned the
battlefield into hell for the enemy and then

text: Maşallah, seni de çok iyi gördüm.
english: Wow, you look great too! Thank goodness
I've arrived, thank God, I've arrived. You're
like a lion, a real lion! What's wrong, Mom
What is this gathering of gentlemen for? We
have a royal feast, Turgut Alp.
We'll talk in the tent. Take
The wound that Ertuğrul Bey opened in our hearts...
...is still very fresh, Turgut Alp. He is
...that he wants us to leave behind everything he entrusted to us...

text: ...ardımızda bırakıp, Gündoğdu Bey'in obasına göç etmemizi ister...

english: Halime Hatun telling the truth? Is that
why you hold a wedding? We want to
We want to be united and strong.
for years in the footsteps of my brother Ertuğrul . We have lost

text: ...Ertuğrul Bey'imizin kemikleri sızlamaz mı Dündar Bey?
english: ...wouldn't Ertuğrul Bey's bones ache, Dündar Bey?
It aches, it aches, brother. Doesn't it sting?
(Hayme) After our Ertuğrul Bey was martyred...

text: Dündar Bey de bu kararı almıştır.
english: Mr. Dündar has also made this decision. The

text: Artuk Bey, Dündar Bey'in bu kararına...
english: Artuk Bey opposed Dündar Bey's decision and aspired to the leadership of the principality
(Hayme) The decision is up to the council.

text: Aslıhan Hatun'un başında da bela vardır.
english: Aslıhan Hatun is also in trouble.
He wants to migrate to him with his tribe.
Who is this Mr. Bahadır? Is it
(Artuk) No, it's not Turgut Alp. He's
The Alps have just returned from battle. We

text: Aileleri bu acı gününde yalnız koymayalım.
english: these families alone during this difficult time . It would be good if

text: Sizin beylerle beraber onların yanında olmanız iyi olur.
english: you were with them, along with the gentlemen .
...it would be better if the wedding were held tomorrow. That's
the truth, Mr. Dündar. It is

text: Aileler yas tutarken toy yapmamız bize yakışmaz.
english: not appropriate for us to hold celebrations while families are mourning. Let it be as you say
I accept the postponement of the wedding until tomorrow.

text: Benim de tez Çavdar Obası'na varmam gerek.
english: I also need to get to Çavdar Obası quickly.
They also have martyrs. I must

text: Alplerini teslim edip, taziyede bulunmam icap eder.
english: surrender my Alps and offer my condolences. May
the souls of all martyrs rest in peace.

text: Ben de seninle geleyim, sana yoldaşlık edeyim.
english: me come with you, let me keep you company.
job, woman! It was a feast

text: Tam da Emir Hazretleri'ne yaraşır bir sofra olmuş.
english: truly befitting His Highness the Emir . A
man's reputation is revealed by his hospitality.

text: Daha ne mükellef sofralar hazırlayacağım sana beyim.
english: What more exquisite meals will I prepare for you, my lord?

text: Ne yaptığınızı sanırsınız otağımda Bahadır Bey?
english: What do you think you're doing in my tent, Mr. Bahadır?
His Highness the Emir will be coming to visit.

text: Onun için ziyafet hazırlattım, Aslıhan Hatun!
english: I've prepared a feast for her, Aslıhan Hatun!
Why am I not informed about his future? He
Emir and I will be meeting.
I am the lady of this tribe!
The tent is mine too! If
His Highness the Emir is coming...
If a feast is to be prepared...
...I'll be the one to arrange it!

text: Bundan böyle burası benim de otağımdır!
english: From now on, this is my dwelling place too!
Where do you get the audacity to do that?
His Highness the Emir has arrived, my lord.

text: Bu mektubu kaleye götürüp Marya'ya vereceksin.
english: this letter to the castle and give it to Marya.

text: Bu sefer mektubu Ares'in tahtına bıraksın.
english: This time, let him leave the letter on Ares' throne. Let

text: Ares de ne kadar ciddi olduğumuzu görsün.
english: Ares see how serious we are.

text: Ertuğrul'u almak için on bin altını vereceğini duyunca...
english: When he hears that he will pay ten thousand gold coins to get Ertuğrul back...

text: Ölmeden o mektubu sana yedireceğim Antheus!
english: you eat that letter before I die, Antheus!
(Ares) You're going to tell me everything!
(Antheus) Ah! I'll tell you everything, sir!
Where did Simko take Ertuğrul? Ugh!

text: Bana burada durmamı söyledi. Ertuğrul'u alıp buraya gelecek.
english: He told me to stay here. He will bring Ertuğrul here.
So, he's bringing Ertuğrul here, huh?

text: İçeride zincire vurulu genç biri var efendim.
english: There's a young man chained up inside, sir.

text: Şuraya bakın. Ayağımıza yeni köleler geldi.
english: Look here. New slaves have arrived at our feet.

text: Yazık oldu. Bunlar da bizim gibi köle olacaklar.
english: shame. They too will become slaves, just like us. We
Our numbers are increasing. Look at me

text: Bundan sonra neyiniz var, neyiniz yok, benim!
english: now on, whatever you have , whatever you don't have, it's all mine!
Take the four people in the back. Just

text: Topalı öldürün gitsin, bizim bir işimize yaramaz.
english: kill the lame man, he's no use to us anyway.
Bring Marya here. Yes sir, please
The dishes are absolutely delicious, mashallah.
God willing, I will have more feasts prepared for you in my tent.

text: Bahadır Bey'in obası yakında burada olur.
english: Bahadır Bey's encampment will be here soon.
When will you hold the Beylik assembly? I need to discuss

text: Bu meseleyi önce beylerimle istişare etmem gerekir.
english: this matter with my superiors first .

text: Eğer iki obanın birleşmesine karar verilirse...
english: If it is decided that the two tribes should unite ...

text: ...o vakit beylik toyu için gereğini yaparım.
english: ...then I will do what is necessary for the chieftain's feast. The

text: ...sultanımızın emriyle bu topraklara göç için yola çıkmıştır.
english: ...has set out to migrate to these lands on the order of our sultan .
came here by order of our sultan.
So, whatever you and the gentlemen

text: ...ne karar verirseniz verin, Bahadır Bey buraya yerleşecek.
english: decide, Mr. Bahadır will settle here. Our

text: Fermana karşı boynumuz kıldan incedir elbet.
english: necks are as thin as a hair in the face of the decree, of course.

text: Lakin Ertuğrul Bey'imle Aliyar Bey'imin de vasiyeti vardır.
english: However, Ertuğrul Bey and Aliyar Bey also have wills. We will stand united with

text: Devletimize hizmet için Kayılarla birlik hâlinde olacağız.
english: the Kayı tribe to serve our state . I have no intention of relinquishing

text: Bu vasiyet için de beyliği bırakmaya niyetim yoktur.
english: my principality for the sake of this will .
You're dragging your feet, Aslıhan Hatun.

text: Bahadır Bey de pazarın başına geçecek.
english: Mr. Bahadır will also take charge of the market.
Neither have the Kayı tribe migrated yet...

text: ...ne de Hanlı Pazar Bahadır Bey'in oldu.
english: ...nor has Hanlı Bazaar become the property of Bahadır Bey.
You don't roll up your sleeves before you see the stream.

text: Kayıların ardına sığınması yetmezmiş gibi bir de...
english: seeking refuge behind the Kayı tribe wasn't enough, she was also...
betrothed to their chieftain, as a woman from the Çavdar family, of Bey bloodline.
Don't overstep your boundaries, Mr. Bahadır! It is you,

text: Törelere karşı gelerek haddini aşan asıl sensin Aslıhan Hatun!
english: Aslıhan Hatun, who has overstepped your bounds by defying tradition!

text: Aslıhan Hatun, Turgut Alp geldi. Müsaade ederseniz içeri girmek ister.
english: Aslıhan Hatun, Turgut Alp has arrived. He'd like to come in if you'll allow him.
(Chain breaking sound) We reached the borders with
Taking advantage of our state being engaged in war...
...those unruly elements who attempted to invade our lands... ...were not allowed to set
We heard, we heard. We have heard of

text: Senin ve Alplerinin yiğitlikleri kulağımıza kadar geldi.
english: your and your Alpine bravery . You have become

text: Devletimizin övüncü, sultanımızın güvenci oldunuz, Turgut Alpbaşı'm.
english: the pride of our state and the trust of our Sultan , Turgut Alpbaşı.
We have fulfilled our last duty.
We brought their weapons back to their families. My
condolences. May our state and homeland, for which

text: Sağ dönen Alplerinizi teslim edip, malumat vermek için...
...münasip bir vakitte sizinle görüşmek isterim Aslıhan Hatun.
english: I would like to meet with you at a suitable time, Aslıhan Hatun, to deliver your returning Alps and to provide you with information.
Here we consult with His Highness the Emir .
Our consultation here is over, Mr. Bahadır! I've said what I wanted to say
you will leave the presence of His Highness the Emir.

text: Sende ne edep kalmış, ne töre!
english: You have neither manners nor customs left! I'm
not going to learn tradition from you! While
the Emir is present with the lady of this tribe...
What do you want from me?
Where is the range? It is for the
Grant me your name, brave one.

text: Hadi bakalım Ertuğrul Bey. Azatlık cengidir.
english: Ertuğrul Bey. It is a struggle for freedom. Come on

text: Beyliği omuzlamış bir hatunun üzerine yürümek...

text: Haddine midir senin bir beye el sürmek?
english: dare you lay a hand on a gentleman?
Ertuğrul Bey! He's running away! Go after

text: Sen o aşağılık herifin peşinden git Ertuğrul Bey.

english: We'll take care of ourselves. You are

text: (Hepsi bir ağızdan) Tanrı seni korusun Ertuğrul Bey.
english: (All in unison) May God protect you, Ertuğrul Bey.
Come on, brave men, follow him!
(Ertuğrul) Come on, brave men! Come on!
God be with you, Turkish Bey.
